title: Audit SOX Entity-Level Controls
description: An auditor assesses the company-wide (entity-level) controls as part of the annual Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) compliance audit.

tasks.description: Review the company's Code of Conduct and verify that all employees have completed their annual ethics training.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms a 98% completion rate for ethics training.

tasks.description: Review the minutes from the Board of Directors' Audit Committee meetings to ensure they are meeting regularly and discussing financial risks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms the committee met quarterly and minutes show discussion of key risks.

tasks.description: Interview senior management to assess the 'tone at the top' regarding ethics and internal controls.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor documents management's commitment to a strong control environment.
